post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Brief Job Description:
?Develop Java Based Gateway Applications
?Develop Java Applications for Wireless POS (Point of Sales) systems


Technical Skills Required:
Experience with the following is considered a must:
?Minimum of five (5) yrs. experience as a software developer
?Minimum of three (3) yrs hands on Java Experience
?Extensive JDK package knowledge
?Servlets 2.2, JDBC, XML, DOM, SAX
?JZME, JMS, EJB
?HTTP, SMTP, JSP, JNI


Other Skills Required:
?Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
?Proven leadership skills
?Ability to manage others and work independently
?Excellent Time Management skills are a must in this role in addition to the need to multi-task


Education: BSc.


Location: Toronto


Level: Senior

Email: careers@mistwireless.com

NO AGENCIES PLEASE.

Please note: inicate in the subject line of your email the title of the position you are applying for.



Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: SENIOR GATEWAY JAVA DEVELOPER  

Contact Information
Careers @mistwireless.com
careers@mistwireless.com
MIST Inc
703 Evans Ave., Suite 500
Etobicoke ON M9C 5E9
post.title: SENIOR GATEWAY JAVA DEVELOPER
